min-max normalization

Source: R/base.R
normalization.Rd

min-max normalization

Usage

normalization(x, z = 0.2)

Arguments

x

numeric vector

z

scalar add minimum value to avoid 0

Value

normalized vector

Examples

normalization(runif(100,min = -100, max = 100))
#>   [1] 0.7172641 0.9145908 0.6396188 0.9139686 0.2000000 0.4523375 0.9095836
